mapper.select: select id, course_id, user_id, user_comment, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2 from yikaodb.course_comment where id = #{id}
select id, course_id, user_id, user_comment, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2 from yikaodb.course_comment limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into yikaodb.course_comment(course_id, user_id, user_comment, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values (#{courseId}, #{userId}, #{userComment}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{obj1}, #{obj2})

insert into yikaodb.course_comment(course_id, user_id, user_comment, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values
(#{entity.courseId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userComment}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.obj1}, #{entity.obj2})

insert into yikaodb.course_comment(course_id, user_id, user_comment, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values
(#{entity.courseId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userComment}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.obj1}, #{entity.obj2})
on duplicate key update course_id = values(course_id) , user_id = values(user_id) , user_comment = values(user_comment) , createtime = values(createtime) , updatetime = values(updatetime) , obj1 = values(obj1) , obj2 = values(obj2)
mapper.update:
update yikaodb.course_comment
course_id = #{courseId},
user_id = #{userId},
user_comment = #{userComment},
createtime = #{createtime},
updatetime = #{updatetime},
obj1 = #{obj1},
obj2 = #{obj2},
where id = #{id}
